name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Trivial Spinach Lasagna
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on spinach lasagna. —Ed Levine Trivial Spinach Lasagna...

recipeInstructions.text: Chop a few cloves of garlic; sauté them a bit. Then, in a fairly deep pan, layer the following: a swirl of tomato sauce, a layer of uncooked lasagna noodles, more sauce, garlic, dollops of ricotta, a thick pile of spinach, garlic, noodles, sauce, ricotta.
Cover it all with slices of mozzarella. Add extra layers if you have room. Let this sit overnight in the fridge.
When ready to bake, preheat oven to 350°F, cover pan with foil, and bake for 30 minutes. Uncover pan and bake 30 minutes more.
